actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the issuance of United States War Bonds to aid in funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
short_title: United States War Bonds Act of 2009

summary.text: United States War Bonds Act of 2009 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue United States War Bonds to aid in the funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.

titles.title: United States War Bonds Act of 2009
A bill to authorize the issuance of United States War Bonds to aid in funding of the operations in Iraq and Afghanistan.
